name: The Breed Demo.
description:
The Breed is a Remake of an old Topdown action horror game back in 2016.
The game is set in the Philippines during the 90's Where a town is mysteriously transformed into hell, the residents have turned into horrible grotesque creatures, it is up to the player to find out the cause of the disaster.

This is still in early development but I am planning on expanding the game by chapters.
